practice_phrases: What you wanted
Lo que querías
If I had known what
Si hubiera sabido lo que
I would have known what to say
Habría sabido lo que decir
Known what you were trying to show
Sabido lo que estabas intentando mostrar
If I had known what you wanted
Si hubiera sabido lo que querías
I should have known what to do
Debería haber sabido lo que hacer
I would have done it differently if I had known what you wanted
Lo habría hecho diferentemente si hubiera sabido lo que querías
If I had known what you were trying to say earlier
Si hubiera sabido lo que estabas intentando decir antes
I'm sorry I didn't know what you wanted me to do
Lo siento que no sabía lo que querías que hiciera
If I had known what was going to happen I would have been more patient
Si hubiera sabido lo que iba a pasar habría sido más paciente
